name: Blake Tillery
background: Born October 9, 1983 in Vidalia, Georgia. Graduated from the University of Georgia (BA International Affairs) in 2006 and earned a J.D. from University of Georgia School of Law in 2010. Former Chairman of the Toombs County Commission and attorney in Vidalia.
keyIssues: Fiscal responsibility and state budget control
Support for rural infrastructure and workforce development
